Phase Paragon does not exist and cannot hurt you.
Low-tech is cringe. This loading tip brought to you by the Tri-Tachyon corporation.
Pillage, then burn. Not the other way around.
Never turn your back on an enemy. Unless you have omni shields, and then turn all you want.
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from a big gun.
That which does not kill you has made a tactical error.
If it's stupid and it works, it's still stupid.
The pen is mightier than the sword, as long as you use it to write production orders for more swords.
If you put reinforced bulkheads and converted hangar on an Apogee, this mod will log your address and notify the police.
If you see this tip and Iron Shell has been released, congratulations. What's it like living in the future?

Add 1 packet of yeast and 2 tsp sugar to 1 1/3 cups of warm water. Let foam. Add 3 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tsp salt, 2 tbsp dried rosemary, and knead for 5 minutes. Shape into ball, place in oiled bowl, cover with damp towel, and let rise for 1 hour. Remove dough, place onto oiled baking sheet, and flatten to 1/2 inch thickness. Poke dents into dough. Cover and let rise for 20 minutes. Bake on 400F for 20 minutes. Enjoy.
Phase Paragon does exist, and will absolutely hurt you if given the opportunity.
The AI will occasionally underuse missiles. Set your missile groups to linked mode to force better strike damage at the cost of ammo expenditure.
Armor applies a damage multiplier equal to (hit damage)/(hit damage + armor value).
